name: TreasuryPrism
0:
”Alexa open treasury prism.”
”Alexa start treasury prism.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: treasury prism
des: Welcome to the Treasury Prism Showcase. Over here, we showcase the Treasury Prism that we have launched to help our clients to better manage their cash. Realising that cash management is a hassle faced by many treasurers, we took up the opportunity to develop a solution to help them find the optimal cash management strategy. After understanding the various challenges faced by corporate treasury and finance professionals, we came up with Treasury Prism.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
